description: Make sure that for Postgre SQL Database Server, parameter 'log_checkpoints' is set to 'ON'
Make sure that for PostgreSQL Database, server parameter 'log_connections' is set to 'ON'
Make sure that for PostgreSQL Database, server parameter 'log_disconnections' is set to 'ON'
Make sure that for PostgreSQL Database, server parameter 'log_duration' is set to 'ON'
Ensure that Connection Throttling is set for the PostgreSQL server

query_name: Redis Cache Allows Non SSL Connections
description: Check if any Redis Cache resource allows non-SSL connections.

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_redis_cache[example].enable_non_ssl_port' is false or undefined (false as default)

query_name: Role Definition Allows Custom Role Creation
description: Role Definition should not allow custom role creation

files.expected_value: azurerm_role_definition[example].permissions.actions does not allow custom role creation
azurerm_role_definition[example].permissions.actions does not allow custom role creation
azurerm_role_definition[example].permissions.actions does not allow custom role creation
azurerm_role_definition[example2].permissions.actions does not allow custom role creation

description: Make sure that for SQL Servers, 'Auditing' is set to 'On'

query_name: SQL Server Predictable Active Directory Account Name
description: Azure SQL Server must avoid using predictable Active Directory Administrator Account names, like 'Admin', which means the attribute 'login' must be set to a name that is not easy to predict

query_name: SQL Server Predictable Admin Account Name
description: Azure SQL Server's Admin account login must avoid using names like 'Admin', that are too predictable, which means the attribute 'administrator_login' must be set to a name that is not easy to predict

query_name: Security Center Pricing Tier Is Not Standard
description: Make sure that the 'Standard' pricing tiers were selected.
Security Contact Email should be defined
Azure Virtual Network subnet must be configured with a Network Security Group, which means the attribute 'security_group' must be defined and not empty
Ensure that Activity Log Retention is set 365 days or greater

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[positive1].retention_policy.days' is greater than or equal to 365 days or 0 (indefinitely)
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[positive1].retention_policy.days' is lesser than 365 days or different than 0 (indefinitely)

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[fail].retention_policy.days' is greater than or equal to 365 days or 0 (indefinitely)
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[fail].retention_policy.days' is lesser than 365 days or different than 0 (indefinitely)

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[fail].retention_policy.days' is greater than or equal to 365 days or 0 (indefinitely)
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[fail].retention_policy.days' is lesser than 365 days or different than 0 (indefinitely)

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[example].retention_policy.days' is greater than or equal to 365 days or 0 (indefinitely)
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_monitor_log_profile[example].retention_policy.days' is lesser than 365 days or different than 0 (indefinitely)

description: Flow logs enable capturing information about IP traffic flowing in and out of the network security groups. Network Security Group Flow Logs must be enabled with retention period greater than or equal to 90 days. This is important, because these logs are used to check for anomalies and give information of suspected breaches
Make sure for SQL Servers that Auditing Retention is greater than 90 days

query_name: Storage Account Not Using Latest TLS Encryption Version
description: Ensure Storage Account is using the latest version of TLS encryption

query_name: Storage Share File Allows All ACL Permissions
description: Azure Storage Share File should not allow all ACL (Access Control List) permissions - r (read), w (write), d (delete), and l (list).

files.expected_value: azurerm_storage_share[example].acl.access_policy.permissions does not allow all ACL permissions

query_name: Storage Table Allows All ACL Permissions
description: Azure Storage Table should not allow all ACL (Access Control List) permissions - r (read), w (write), d (delete), and l (list).

files.expected_value: azurerm_storage_table[table_resource].acl.permissions does not allow all ACL permissions

description: Azure SQL Server Accessibility must be set to a minimal address range, which means the difference between the values of the 'end_ip_address' and 'start_ip_address' must be lesser than 256. Additionally, both ips must be different from '0.0.0.0'

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[positive4].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is lesser than 256
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[positive4].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is greater than or equal to 256

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[positive3].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is lesser than 256
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[positive3].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is greater than or equal to 256

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is lesser than 256
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is greater than or equal to 256

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is lesser than 256
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is greater than or equal to 256

query_name: Virtual Network with DDoS Protection Plan disabled
description: Virtual Network should have DDoS Protection Plan enabled

query_name: WAF Is Disabled For Azure Application Gateway
description: Check if Web Application Firewall is disabled or not configured for Azure's Application Gateway.
Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) API should not be exposed to the internet

description: App Service should have 'http2_enabled' enabled
Azure Active Directory must be used for authentication for Service Fabric
Azure Front Door WAF should be enabled
Check if the Kubernetes Dashboard is enabled.
